title: Bookstores are ‘essential businesses.’ Let us stay open — safely. - Houston Chronicle
description: Eighteen months ago, my business partner and I opened an independent bookshop in Columbia, Missouri. The first few years of any business are always difficult, especially in retail, and especially in the book industry, where margins are notoriously thin and…
